column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Funny story
column2: I bought my mom a bag of coffee beans as a part of her birthday gift and I didn't pay attention to the price the person at the register said before she swiped my card. I was a fool for that. Later when this transaction showed up on my bank statement
column3: I freaked out because my meal was close to $200. When I called them like
column4: "Yooo why was my food so much?" I discovered that their bag of coffee beans is $125!!!!!!! WOW. I wasn't even mad about it because it was of course my fault for not paying attention but mannnn
column5: be careful that the pretty packaging doesn't distract you as you wait in line.
